modShortDescription: This modlet adds a grenade tipped arrow to the game, also makes all the arrows glow like the spear. It is completely xml.
modDescription:
This modlet adds a grenade tipped [arrow](https://7daystodiemods.com/tag/7-days-to-die-ammo/) to the game, also makes all the arrows glow like the spear. It is completely xml and adds no new images to the game, thus remaining safe for server side only installs.

**[Download](https://github.com/wtk34Mods/wtk34Mods_grenade_arrow/archive/master.zip)**

**Credits:** [wtk34](https://7daystodiemods.com/tag/wtk34/), bigD2
